Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE, CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE, SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE, STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT 8. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.2. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE PAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE*  01. NEW ENGLAND 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 08. MOUNTAIN 09. PACIFIC 10. FOREIGN 11. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.3. WHERE WAS YOUR HOME FOR MOST OF THE PAST FIVE YEARS BEFORE YOU ENTERED THE ARMY*  1. ON A FARM 2. IN A TOWN WITH FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE 3. IN A CITY BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE 4. IN A CITY BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE 5. IN A CITY WITH MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.4. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY*  1. 19 YEARS OR UNDER 2. 20 YEARS 3. 21-24 YEARS 4. 25-27 YEARS 5. 28-29 YEARS 6. 30 TO 34 YEARS 7. 35 AND OVER 8. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.5. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL*  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL OR TRADE SCHOOL 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. COLLEGE GRADUATE 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.6. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED 4. WIDOWED 5. SEPARATED 6. UNDESIGNATED CODE 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.7A. IF YOU ARE MARRIED, HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN MARRIED*  01. LESS THAN 2 MONTHS 02. 2 OR 3 MONTHS 03. 4 OR 5 MONTHS 04. 6 OR 7 MONTHS 05. 8 OR 9 MONTHS 06. 10 OR 11 MONTHS 07. 12 OR 13 MONTHS 08. 14 OR 15 MONTHS 09. 16 TO 22 MONTHS 10. 22 MONTHS OR MORE 98. NO ANSWER 99. INAPPLICABLE (SINGLE) 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.7B. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY*  1. BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 2. AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 3. NO ANSWER 8. UNDESIGNATED CODE 9. SINGLE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.8. IF YOU ARE MARRIED, HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE*  1. NONE 2. ONE 3. TWO 4. THREE OR MORE 5. NO ANSWER 8. UNDESIGNATED CODE 9. SINGLE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.9. WHETHER YOU ARE A CHURCH MEMBER OR NOT, DO YOU CONSIDER YOURSELF:  1. CATHOLIC 2. JEWISH 3. PROTESTANT 4. OTHER 5. NONE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.10. WHEN DID YOU ENTER THE ARMY* P. IF YOU HAVE SERVED PREVIOUSLY IN THE ARMY, CHECK LAST TIME YOU ENTERED. IF YOU WERE A NATIONAL GUARDSMAN, CHECK WHEN YOUR OUTFIT ENTERED ARMY. E. LENGTH OF TIME IN THE ARMY.  1. OCT. 1942 TO PRESENT (3 MONTHS OR LESS) 2. JULY 1942 TO SEPT. 1942 (4-6 MONTHS) 3. JAN. 1942 TO JUNE 1942 (7-12 MONTHS) 4. JAN. 1941 TO DEC. 1941 (1-2 YEARS) 5. PRIOR TO JAN. 1941 (2 YEARS AND OVER) 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.11. WHAT IS YOUR FATHER,S USUAL JOB OR OCCUPATION* PLEASE STATE SPECIFICALLY WHAT HE DOES. IF HE IS DEAD, OR RETIRED, DESCRIBE HIS FORMER JOB OR OCCUPATION.  1. PROFESSIONAL AND MANAGERIAL OCCUPATION 2. CLERICAL AND SALES 3. SERVICE 4. AGRICULTURAL 5. SKILLED WORKER 6. SEMI-SKILLED WORKER 7. UNSKILLED WORKER 8. OTHERS 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.12. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT ARMY FOOD*  1. IT IS GOOD QUALITY AND WELL PREPARED 2. IT IS GOOD QUALITY, BUT POORLY PREPARED 3. UNDECIDED 4. IT IS POOR QUALITY, BUT WELL PREPARED 5. IT IS POOR QUALITY, AND POORLY PREPARED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.14. DO YOU THINK YOU ARE A GOOD SOLDIER*  1. YES, ONE OF THE BEST 2. YES, ALTHOUGH MAYBE NOT ONE OF THE BEST 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO, NOT YET, BUT I WILL BE 5. NO, AND I DON,T THINK I EVER WILL BE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

UNDECIDED 4. SOMEWHAT BETTER ONES COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 5. MUCH BETTER ONES COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.24. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER DO YOU THINK THE WAR WILL LAST*  1. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 2. 6 MONTHS TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 6. OVER 4 YEARS UP TO 5 YEARS 7. OVER 5 YEARS 8. HAVEN,T ANY IDEA 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

I AM NOT EXACTLY IN FAVOR OF IT, BUT IT MIGHT BE A GOOD IDEA 3. I AM NOT EXACTLY AGAINST IT, BUT IT DOESN,T SEEM TO BE A GOOD IDEA 4. I AM STRONGLY AGAINST IT 5. NO OPINION 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.44. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE STATEMENT THAT "THE ARMY MAKES A MAN OUT OF YOU*"  1. THERE,S A LOT TO IT 2. THERE MAY BE SOMETHING TO IT, BUT I,M STILL DOUBTFUL 3. THERE IS NOT MUCH TO IT 4. NO OPINION 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

YES, I MIGHT LIKE IT, BUT I,M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON,T THINK I WOULD LIKE IT 4. NO, I WOULD NOT LIKE IT AT ALL 5. NO OPINION 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.46. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY FOR A CAREER AFTER THE WAR*  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I,M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON,T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I ABSOLUTELY WOULD NOT WANT TO 5. NO OPINION 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

HE THINKS LESS AND LESS ABOUT IT THE LONGER HE IS IN THE ARMY 3. HE THINKS ABOUT IT NO MORE AND NO LESS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

BETTER OFF THAN BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 2. WORSE OFF THAN BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 3. ABOUT THE SAME AS BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 4. NO OPINION 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

BETTER OFF THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. WORSE OFF THAN BEFORE THE WAR 3. ABOUT THE SAME AS BEFORE THE WAR 4. NO OPINION 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

I HAVE HARDLY EVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 4. I HAVE NEVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA P. A SOLDIER MAY HAVE WONDERED ABOUT MANY OTHER QUESTIONS CONCERNING HIS PERSONAL FUTURE.
